doc:
David MacCreedy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_MacCreedy 0 David MacCreedy is an English film, television and theatre actor, as well as being a director and film producer. He is best known for his role as Cpl Pete Polson in the television series All Quiet on the Preston Front and for playing Tony in the rugby film Up 'n' Under. David_MacCreedy is an_English_film_,_television_and_theatre_actor , as_well_as being a_director_and_film_producer . He is_best_known for his_role as Cpl_Pete_Polson in the_television_series All_Quiet on the_Preston_Front and for playing Tony in the_rugby_film Up_'n'_Under .
